SEARCH
Package data

Class ProductDAO

java.lang.Object
data.GenericDAO<Product>
data.ProductDAO
public class ProductDAO extends GenericDAO<Product>
Data Access Object specifically for handling database operations related to the Product entity. This class extends the GenericDAO and provides concrete implementations specific to the Product entity.

    • ProductDAO

      public ProductDAO()
      Constructor for ProductDAO. It specifies the Product class type to the superclass GenericDAO.

  • Method Details

    • getTableName

      protected String getTableName()
      Provides the name of the database table associated with the Product entity. Overrides the default behavior to specify a custom table name, which is `product` in this case.
      Overrides:
      getTableName in class GenericDAO<Product>
      Returns:
      the name of the database table for Product

    • getPrimaryKeyColumnName

      protected String getPrimaryKeyColumnName()
      Provides the primary key column name for the Product entity. This implementation is necessary because the primary key for Product is not the default 'id'.
      Overrides:
      getPrimaryKeyColumnName in class GenericDAO<Product>
      Returns:
      the primary key column name for the Product table

    • getFieldColumnMapping

      protected Map<String,String> getFieldColumnMapping()
      Provides a mapping from Product object fields to database column names. This mapping is essential for the generic DAO to perform database operations that require column names. Maps fields like product name, price, and quantity to their respective columns.
      Specified by:
      getFieldColumnMapping in class GenericDAO<Product>
      Returns:
      a map of Product field names to database column names
